.b-sch-event.title: Event color
.b-sch-event.content: The color of events can be determined by assigning to eventColor on either SchedulerEventModel, SchedulerResourceModel or scheduler itself

.b-sch-style-line.title: Event style
.b-sch-style-line.content: The event style works in much the same way as the color, by assigning to eventStyle
